message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. This item holds an immense worth of $15000 to you, based on your needs and preferences. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a high-value item at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.
